description: This file defines the AuthManager class, which manages user authentication state by storing a pseudo token in encrypted shared preferences. It provides methods for login, logout, and checking login status, intended as a demo implementation.

classes.name: AuthManager
classes.description: A simple local authentication manager that uses encrypted shared preferences to store a pseudo token.

methods.name: isLoggedIn
methods.description: Checks if the user is logged in by verifying the presence of a token in shared preferences.

methods.name: login
methods.description: Authenticates the user with email and password, stores a pseudo token if credentials are non-empty.

methods.name: logout
methods.description: Removes the authentication token from shared preferences, effectively logging out the user.
